downloadTitle: Archive Viewer Quick Card for Compliance Managers
downloadDescription: This document describes how to use the Archive Viewer to perform supervisory and compliance-related tasks.

downloadFile.name: Archive Viewer Compliance Management Quick Card 8.2.doc

detailsSection:
The Exchange Hosted Services archive can be accessed through the Archive Viewer—a Web-based console that enables users with appropriate rights to perform supervisory and compliance-related tasks. This document covers the following tasks:
• Sign in to the Archive Viewer
• View messages
• Search for messages
• Review messages
• Monitor messages
• Export messages
detailsSection_file_name: Archive Viewer Compliance Management Quick Card 8.2.doc
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or choose a different language from the drop-down list and click Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
